MessageTypes.label: XPDR state
MessageTypes.description: $ is a number that indicates lateral mode: : 0 = Off, 1 = Standby,2 = Test, 3 = On, 4 = Alt, 5 = Ground

MessageTypes.label: Current Squawk Code
MessageTypes.description: $ is the current Transponder Code as a number.

MessageTypes.label: Pressure Alt Flight Level
MessageTypes.description: $ is the current Pressure Altitude as an FL. e.g. 200 feet is 002

MessageTypes.label: Number Button Press
MessageTypes.description: $ is a number indicating a number button was pressed (0-7)

MessageTypes.label: CLR Button Press
MessageTypes.description: $ is 1 when the CLR Button is pressed
